price: 62. Wana ezali mobeko moye Allah atiya epai ya baye baleka liboso, mpe okokutaka mbonguana na mobeko mwa Allah te.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi fī alladhīna khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
